item.title: 摩根大通为受洛杉矶野火影响的房贷客户提供暂缓还款措施
item.description: 摩根大通银行周一表示，该行房屋贷款部门正在为受洛杉矶野火影响的房贷客户提供灾难暂缓贷款。【原文：JPMorgan Chase's home lending unit is providing disaster forbearance to mortgage customers affected by the Los Angeles wildfires, the bank said on Monday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，面包连锁加盟店 Crumbl 探讨 20 亿美元出售事宜
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Crumbl 的所有者正在探讨出售事宜，包括债务在内，这家广受欢迎的饼干连锁店的估值可能接近 20 亿美元。【原文：The owners of Crumbl are exploring a sale that could value the popular cookie chain at nearly $2 billion, including debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 碧桂园物业服务部门预计年度盈利将下降
item.description: 中国建筑商碧桂园的物业服务部门预计，由于其环卫业务计划计提商誉和有形资产减值费用，该部门的年度盈利将下降至多 11 亿元人民币（1.503 亿美元）。【原文：The property services arm of Chinese builder Country Garden is expecting a drop of up to 1.10 billion yuan ($150.03 million) in annual earnings as its sanitation business plans to record an impairment charge for goodwill and tangible assets.】

item.title: 纽约联储调查显示 12 月通胀预期不一
item.description: 纽约联储周一的一项调查显示，由于对家庭偿债能力的担忧加剧，12月份美国消费者对通胀预期路径的看法不一。【原文：U.S. consumers' outlook on the expected path of inflation was mixed in December amid rising worries about households' ability to make debt payments, a survey by the New York Federal Reserve showed on Monday.】

item.title: 梅森资本向西班牙监管机构投诉 Grifols 的透明度问题
item.description: 美国投资基金梅森资本（Mason Capital）周一表示，它已致函西班牙股市监管机构 CNMV，要求陷入困境的制药公司 Grifols 提高透明度。【原文：U.S.-based investment fund Mason Capital said on Monday it had sent a letter to Spain's stock market regulator CNMV demanding more transparency from the embattled pharmaceutical company Grifols .】

item.title: T-Mobile 拟斥资 6 亿美元收购 Vistar Media 以加强广告业务
item.description: T-Mobile 美国公司周一表示，已同意以约 6 亿美元的全现金交易收购实时户外广告技术提供商 Vistar Media。【原文：T-Mobile US said on Monday it has agreed to acquire Vistar Media, a real-time outdoor advertising technology provider, for about $600 million, in an all-cash deal.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，英伟达最大客户推迟订购最新人工智能机架
item.description: 据《信息》周一报道，由于过热问题，英伟达（Nvidia）的顶级客户正在推迟订购这家人工智能芯片领导者最新的 "Blackwell "机架。【原文：Nvidia's top customers are delaying orders of the AI chip leader's latest 'Blackwell' racks due to overheating issues, the Information reported on Monday.】

item.title: 威兹航空公司首席执行官认为普惠发动机的困境将持续4-5年
item.description: 这家低成本航空公司的首席执行官周一表示，普拉特惠特尼 RTX 发动机的问题已经导致威兹航空公司的一些飞机停飞，这种情况可能会持续四五年。【原文：Issues with Pratt & Whitney RTX engines that have grounded some Wizz Air planes could last four or five years, the low cost carrier's chief executive said on Monday.】

item.title: 在美国证券交易委员会就误导性债券销售达成的和解协议中，BMO 部门将支付 4070 万美元
item.description: 蒙特利尔银行（Bank of Montreal）的一个部门同意支付 4070 万美元，以了结美国证券交易委员会的指控，即该行未能监督那些在该行出售的抵押贷款支持债券的吸引力方面误导投资者的员工。【原文：A unit of Bank of Montreal agreed to pay $40.7 million to settle U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission charges that it failed to supervise employees who misled investors about the attractiveness of mortgage-backed bonds the bank was selling.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，苹果公司向应用程序开发者收取的新费用受到欧盟新一轮审查
item.description: 据彭博社周一援引知情人士的话报道，苹果公司向应用程序开发商收取的新费用受到了欧盟反垄断监管机构的新一轮审查，原因是担心这可能会抬高软件制造商的成本。【原文：Apple's new fees for app developers have come under fresh scrutiny from the European Union's antitrust regulators on concerns it could inflate costs for software makers, Bloomberg news reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国最高法院驳回 Meta 为避免广告商诉讼而提出的请求
item.description: 美国最高法院周一拒绝审理 Meta Platforms 提出的避免广告商提起数十亿美元集体诉讼的请求，广告商指控 Facebook 和 Instagram 母公司夸大广告可能覆盖的人数，从而向他们多收费用。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court declined on Monday to hear a bid by Meta Platforms to avoid a multi-billion dollar class action by advertisers that accused the Facebook and Instagram parent company of overcharging them by inflating the number of people their ads might reach.】

item.title: 美国最高法院驳回石油公司要求驳回火奴鲁鲁气候诉讼的请求
item.description: 美国最高法院周一拒绝听取 Sunoco 和其他石油公司的诉讼请求，以阻止火奴鲁鲁指控它们几十年来在燃烧化石燃料导致气候变化的危险方面误导公众的诉讼。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court declined on Monday to hear a bid by Sunoco and other oil companies to scuttle a lawsuit by Honolulu accusing them of misleading the public for decades about the dangers of climate change induced by the burning of fossils fuels.】

item.title: 欧洲中央银行加入 Bluesky，与埃隆-马斯克的 X 竞争
item.description: 欧洲中央银行周一开始在蓝天（Bluesky）微博平台上发帖，加入了埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 的竞争对手行列，而此时这位美国亿万富翁正在欧洲加紧政治竞选活动。【原文：The European Central Bank began posting on the Bluesky micro-blogging platform on Monday, joining a rival to Elon Musk's X just as the U.S. billionaire ramps up his political campaigning in Europe.】

item.title: 在空气产品公司的争夺战中，ISS 支持四位持不同政见的董事候选人中的三位
item.description: 代理咨询公司机构股东服务公司（Institutional Shareholder Services）周一建议空气化工产品公司（Air Products and Chemicals）的投资者从激进投资者曼特尔里奇公司（Mantle Ridge）的四名董事候选人中选出三名。【原文：Proxy advisory firm Institutional Shareholder Services on Monday recommended that Air Products and Chemicals investors elect three of activist investor Mantle Ridge's four director candidates.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，普渡大学的 Sacklers 公司提出在新的阿片类药物和解协议中增加出资额
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一报道，普渡制药公司（Purdue Pharma）的所有者萨克勒（Sackler）家族提出增加对阿片类药物诉讼破产和解的出资，同时同意承担未来诉讼的一些风险。【原文：The Sackler family, owners of Purdue Pharma, is offering to increase their financial contribution to a bankruptcy settlement of opioid lawsuits, while agreeing to some exposure to future litigation, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday.】

item.title: 蒙特利尔银行资本市场就债券柜台监管问题与美国证券交易委员会达成和解
item.description: 蒙特利尔银行资本市场公司（BMO Capital Markets）同意支付 4000 多万美元，以了结美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）对该公司的指控。【原文：BMO Capital Markets agreed to pay more than $40 million to settle U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission charges it failed to properly supervise employees who sold mortgage-backed bonds, the regulator said on Monday.】

item.title: 高盛宣布新资本解决方案部门计划
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）周一宣布，计划将主要业务部门合并为一个名为 "资本解决方案集团 "的单一部门，以发展私人信贷、私募股权和其他资产类别。【原文：Goldman Sachs on Monday announced plans to combine key business segments under a single unit named 'Capital Solutions Group,' to grow in private credit, private equity and other asset classes.】

item.title: 礼来将以最高 25 亿美元收购癌症药物开发商 Scorpion Therapeutics
item.description: 礼来公司周一表示，将以不超过 25 亿美元的现金收购癌症疗法开发商 Scorpion Therapeutics。【原文：Eli Lilly said on Monday it would buy cancer therapy developer Scorpion Therapeutics for up to $2.5 billion in cash.】

item.title: 消息人士称，中国电池巨头 CATL 已为上半年在香港上市聘请银行
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，中国电池巨头 CATL 已聘请摩根大通和美国银行等银行参与香港上市事宜，这可能是该公司 2025 年在香港最大规模的上市之一。【原文：Chinese battery giant CATL has hired banks, including JPMorgan and Bank of America , to work on a Hong Kong listing, in what could be one of the city's largest offerings in 2025, two people with knowledge of the deal said.】

item.title: 公用事业公司杜克能源任命内部人士 Harry Sideris 为首席执行官
item.description: 公用事业公司杜克能源（Duke Energy）周一表示，已任命内部人士 Harry Sideris 担任公司首席执行官，4 月 1 日起生效。【原文：Utility firm Duke Energy said on Monday it has appointed insider Harry Sideris as its chief executive officer, effective April 1.】

item.title: 出租商 SMBC Aviation 首席执行官称，几乎每架飞机都在延误
item.description: 飞机租赁巨头 SMBC Aviation Capital 的负责人周一表示，波音和空客正在交付的几乎每架飞机都出现了延误。【原文：Almost every aircraft being delivered by Boeing and Airbus is delayed, the head of aircraft leasing giant SMBC Aviation Capital said on Monday, later adding that enginemakers had made slight improvements in addressing their issues.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，高盛计划建立新架构，更加专注于融资业务
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一报道，高盛正计划组建一个新的集团，将其全球银行和市场部门的三个分部合并，以加强其对融资交易和向企业提供贷款的关注。【原文：Goldman Sachs is planning to form a new group that will combine three divisions of its global banking and markets unit, to enhance its focus on financing deals and making loans to corporations, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday.】

item.title: 独家报道巴克莱银行可持续发展主管在最新银行改组中离职
item.description: 巴克莱银行集团可持续发展主管劳拉-巴洛（Laura Barlow）的一位发言人告诉路透社记者，巴克莱银行集团可持续发展主管劳拉-巴洛（Laura Barlow）已经卸任，以寻求其他机会，这是英国顶级银行的最新高层调整，因为该行业在气候方面的努力面临越来越多的审查。【原文：Barclays' group head of sustainability Laura Barlow has stepped down to pursue other opportunities, a spokesperson told Reuters, the latest senior reshuffle among Britain's top banks as the sector faces increased scrutiny over its climate efforts.】

item.title: OpenAI 敦促美国优先考虑人工智能资金和监管问题，以领先于中国
item.description: OpenAI 周一阐述了其对美国人工智能发展的愿景，称美国需要外部投资和支持性监管，才能在这一新兴技术的竞争中领先于中国。【原文：OpenAI on Monday laid out its vision for artificial intelligence development in the U.S., saying the country needs outside investment and supportive regulation to stay ahead of China in the race for the nascent technology.】

item.title: VEON 推进乌克兰顶级电信公司 Kyivstar 的美国上市计划
item.description: 电信集团 VEON 正在推进其旗下 Kyivstar 在美国上市的计划，此举将使其成为第一家在美国上市的乌克兰公司。【原文：Telecoms group VEON is moving forward with its plan to float its unit Kyivstar in the U.S., in a move that would make it the first Ukrainian firm to be listed in the United States.】

item.title: 独家报道技术供应商 Arm 计划提价，并考虑开发自己的芯片
item.description: 作为芯片公司的技术供应商，Arm Holdings 正在制定一项长期战略，将价格提高多达 300%，并已讨论过设计自己的芯片，以与其最大的客户竞争。【原文：Arm Holdings , a technology supplier to chip firms, is developing a long-term strategy to hike prices by as much as 300% and has discussed designing its own chips in a move to compete with its biggest customers.】

item.title: 液化天然气出口商 Venture Global 在美国大型 IPO 中寻求高达 1,100 亿美元的估值
item.description: 液化天然气出口商 Venture Global 周一表示，其在美国首次公开募股的目标估值将高达 1,103.8 亿美元，这为 2025 年首次大规模股票市场浮动奠定了基础。【原文：Venture Global is targeting up to $110.38 billion valuation in its U.S. initial public offering, the liquefied natural gas exporter said on Monday, setting the stage for 2025's first blockbuster stock market flotation.】

item.title: 假日需求强劲，Abercrombie & Fitch上调第四季度销售目标
item.description: Abercrombie & Fitch 周一上调了本季度的年度净销售增长目标，这主要得益于假日购物季对其服装系列的强劲需求。【原文：Abercrombie & Fitch on Monday raised its annual net sales growth target for the current quarter helped by strong demand for its apparel collections during the holiday shopping season.】

item.title: 梅西百货预计假日季度销售额低于此前预期
item.description: 梅西百货公司周一表示，预计第四季度净销售额将略低于此前公布的 78 亿至 80 亿美元区间的下限。【原文：Macy's said on Monday it expects fourth-quarter net sales to be slightly below the low-end of the previously issued range of $7.8 billion to $8.0 billion.】

item.title: Moderna下调2025年销售额预期，原因是RSV疫苗起步缓慢，COVID疫苗需求疲软
item.description: 受呼吸道合胞病毒（RSV）疫苗上市缓慢和 COVID-19 疫苗需求疲软的影响，Moderna 公司周一将 2025 年的销售预期下调了 10 亿美元。【原文：Moderna cut its 2025 sales forecast by $1 billion on Monday, hurt by a slow launch of its respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) shot and weak demand for COVID-19 vaccines.】
